entries.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
entries.bio: AI researcher and tech evangelist with over 15 years of experience in machine learning and artificial intelligence. PhD from MIT in Computer Science.

entries.name: Michael Chen
entries.bio: Senior ML Engineer at a leading tech company. Specializes in generative AI and large language models. Former Google Brain researcher.

entries.name: Emily Rodriguez
entries.bio: Tech writer and AI educator passionate about making complex AI concepts accessible to everyone. Former journalist turned AI advocate.

entries.name: Dr. James Wilson
entries.bio: Medical AI specialist exploring the intersection of healthcare and artificial intelligence. Harvard Medical School graduate with a focus on AI diagnostics.

entries.name: Alex Thompson
entries.bio: Full-stack developer and AI integration specialist. Helps businesses implement AI solutions. Regular speaker at tech conferences.
